data.message: Can someone please answer my message. I need to speak with someone.

replies.message: Hey there, Cynthia. Let us know how we can help. -Jessica
My nephew is considered now a missing person. All the answers to where he left and with who are in his inbox. How do we access it? If a police report is needed we have all the necessary information

We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Cynthia. Government officials sometimes request information about people who use Facebook as part of an investigation and we have strict standards in place to handle these requests. You can learn more about the types of requests we receive and how we handle them by visiting Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2bvQ5h9. -Jessica
I have been through all of this. It says nothing on how to go about contacting you to find out what happened and how we can get into his account
